languages.text: "Помимо этого, были обнаружены обширные запасы провизии, оружия и ксен..." {n}Высокий Фактотум осекается, словно только сейчас вспомнив о прокторе.{/n} "...и прочих ценностей, которые мы с великим тщанием загрузим в трюмы флагмана".

"We also discovered a large supply of provisions, weapons, and xeno—" {n}The High Factotum catches himself, having seemingly just remembered Solomorne's presence.{/n} "And other valuables, which will be loaded into the flagship's holds with extreme assiduity."
languages.original_text: "Помимо этого, были обнаружены обширные запасы провизии, оружия и ксен..." {n}Высокий Фактотум осекается, словно только сейчас вспомнив о прокторе.{/n} "...и прочих ценностей, которые мы с великим тщанием загрузим в трюмы флагмана".

traits.locale_text: "We also discovered a large supply of provisions, weapons, and xeno—" {n}The High Factotum catches himself, seemingly having just remembered about Solomorne's presence.{/n} "And other valuables, which will be loaded into the flagship's holds with extreme assiduity."

"We also discovered a large supply of provisions, weapons, and xeno—" {n}The High Factotum catches himself, seemingly having just remembered about Solomorne's presence.{/n} "And other valuables, which will be loaded into the flagship's holds with extreme assiduity."

"We also discovered a large supply of provisions, weapons, and xeno—" {n}The High Factotum catches himself, having seemingly just remembered Solomorne's about presence.{/n} "And other valuables, which will be loaded into the flagship's holds with extreme assiduity."

"We also discovered a large supply of provisions, weapons, and xeno—" {n}The High Factotum catches himself, having seemingly just remembered Solomorne's about presence.{/n} "And other valuables, which will be loaded into the flagship's holds with extreme assiduity."

"We also discovered a large supply of provisions, weapons, and xeno—" {n}The High Factotum catches himself, having seemingly just remembered Solomorne's presence.{/n} "And other valuables, which will be loaded into the flagship's holds with extreme assiduity."

"We also discovered a large supply of provisions, weapons, and xeno—" {n}The High Factotum catches himself, having seemingly just remembered Solomorne's presence.{/n} "And other valuables, which will be loaded into the flagship's holds with extreme assiduity."

languages.text: «También hemos descubierto un gran número de provisiones, armas y xeno...». {n}El Alto Factótum se interrumpe al reparar una vez más en la presencia de Solomorne.{/n} «... y otros bienes, que cargaremos en las bodegas de la nave insignia con extrema diligencia».
languages.original_text: "We also discovered a large supply of provisions, weapons, and xeno—" {n}The High Factotum catches himself, having seemingly just remembered Solomorne's presence.{/n} "And other valuables, which will be loaded into the flagship's holds with extreme assiduity."

traits.locale_text: «También hemos descubierto un gran número de provisiones, armas y xeno...». {n}El Alto Factótum se interrumpe al reparar una vez más en la presencia de Solomorne.{/n} «... y otros bienes, que cargaremos en las bodegas de la nave insignia con extrema diligencia».

languages.text: “我们还发现了大量补给品、武器，以及异形——”{n}高阶顾问突然反应过来，似乎刚刚意识到索罗蒙也在场。{/n}“咳，以及其他贵重物品，我们会将这些贵重物品小心翼翼装进旗舰的货舱。”
languages.original_text: "We also discovered a large supply of provisions, weapons, and xeno—" {n}The High Factotum catches himself, having seemingly just remembered Solomorne's presence.{/n} "And other valuables, which will be loaded into the flagship's holds with extreme assiduity."

traits.locale_text: “我们还发现了大量补给品、武器，以及异形——”{n}高阶顾问突然反应过来，似乎刚刚意识到索罗蒙也在场。{/n}“咳，以及其他贵重物品，我们会将这些贵重物品小心翼翼装进旗舰的货舱。”

languages.text: « Nous avons également découvert un stock important de provisions, d'armes et de xéno... {n}Le haut factotum s'interrompt in extremis, comme s'il venait de se souvenir de la présence de Solomorne.{/n} Et d'autres précieuses marchandises qui seront transbordées dans les cales du vaisseau amiral avec la plus grande diligence. »
languages.original_text: "We also discovered a large supply of provisions, weapons, and xeno—" {n}The High Factotum catches himself, having seemingly just remembered Solomorne's presence.{/n} "And other valuables, which will be loaded into the flagship's holds with extreme assiduity."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons également découvert un stock important de provisions, d'armes et de xéno... {n}Le haut factotum s'interrompt in extremis, comme s'il venait de se souvenir de la présence de Solomorne.{/n} Et d'autres précieuses marchandises qui seront transbordées dans les cales du vaisseau amiral avec la plus grande diligence. »

languages.text: 「私たちは食料品、武器、ゼノの大量な供給も発見しました」{n}ハイ・ファクトタムは、見たところちょうどソロモーンの存在を思い出したことに気づいた。{/n}「そして他の価値あるものは、特別な配慮をして旗艦の貨物室に積まれます」
languages.original_text: "We also discovered a large supply of provisions, weapons, and xeno—" {n}The High Factotum catches himself, having seemingly just remembered Solomorne's presence.{/n} "And other valuables, which will be loaded into the flagship's holds with extreme assiduity."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは食料品、武器、ゼノの大量な供給も発見しました」{n}ハイ・ファクトタムは、見たところちょうどソロモーンの存在を思い出したことに気づいた。{/n}「そして他の価値あるものは、特別な配慮をして旗艦の貨物室に積まれます」

languages.text: "Çok sayıda erzak, silah ve zeno..." {n}Arşıkâhya, Solomorne'un varlığını yeni fark etmişçesine kendini topluyor.{/n} "Ayrıca sancak gemisinin ambarlarına büyük bir titizlikle yüklenmesi gereken daha başka değerli eşyalar keşfettik."
languages.original_text: "We also discovered a large supply of provisions, weapons, and xeno—" {n}The High Factotum catches himself, having seemingly just remembered Solomorne's presence.{/n} "And other valuables, which will be loaded into the flagship's holds with extreme assiduity."

traits.locale_text: "Çok sayıda erzak, silah ve zeno..." {n}Arşıkâhya, Solomorne'un varlığını yeni fark etmişçesine kendini topluyor.{/n} "Ayrıca sancak gemisinin ambarlarına büyük bir titizlikle yüklenmesi gereken daha başka değerli eşyalar keşfettik."

languages.text: "Außerdem haben wir große Mengen an Vorräten, Waffen und Xeno..." {n}Das Hochfaktotum unterbricht sich, als hätte es sich gerade an Solomornes Gegenwart erinnert.{/n} "Und andere Wertgegenstände entdeckt, die derzeit in die Frachträume des Flaggschiffs verladen werden."
languages.original_text: "We also discovered a large supply of provisions, weapons, and xeno—" {n}The High Factotum catches himself, having seemingly just remembered Solomorne's presence.{/n} "And other valuables, which will be loaded into the flagship's holds with extreme assiduity."

traits.locale_text: "Außerdem haben wir große Mengen an Vorräten, Waffen und Xeno..." {n}Das Hochfaktotum unterbricht sich, als hätte es sich gerade an Solomornes Gegenwart erinnert.{/n} "Und andere Wertgegenstände entdeckt, die derzeit in die Frachträume des Flaggschiffs verladen werden."
